Class AverageCalculator

java.lang.Object
  AverageCalculator

public class AverageCalculator
extends Object

Provides needed methods for the calculation of the average values of the attributes for all the cards so that the computer is able to play.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Antonios Skandalis
